about_the_game:
Key Mechanics:

  • Extraction of materials: In Forest Construction VR Demo, several basic sources of building materials, such as trees and stones, are available. You will be able to use various tools to gather them, then divide the collected materials into parts and use them in construction.

  • Crafting: Collected basic resources can be processed on a specialized workbench into various building elements, such as bricks and debarked wood, to improve your constructions.

  • Construction: The construction mechanic allows you to place an object at any angle and in any location, enabling you to build a wide variety of structures such as houses, towers, bridges, and anything else you can imagine using the materials you have gathered and processed.

  • Interactivity: Forest Construction VR Demo offers players excellent physical interactivity. Players will need to carry, transport, lift, and hold tools and construction materials, which have the necessary physical properties for realistic interaction.

  • Sandbox gameplay without survival: Forest Construction VR Demo does not limit you to survival, but invites you to immerse yourself in the creative process of construction and experimentation without unnecessary restrictions.

These key mechanics will help you create unique structures, enjoy the building process, and immerse yourself in the cozy atmosphere of the forest world of the game. Use these opportunities to have a great time.
detailed_description:
Key Mechanics:

  • Extraction of materials: In Forest Construction VR Demo, several basic sources of building materials, such as trees and stones, are available. You will be able to use various tools to gather them, then divide the collected materials into parts and use them in construction.

  • Crafting: Collected basic resources can be processed on a specialized workbench into various building elements, such as bricks and debarked wood, to improve your constructions.

  • Construction: The construction mechanic allows you to place an object at any angle and in any location, enabling you to build a wide variety of structures such as houses, towers, bridges, and anything else you can imagine using the materials you have gathered and processed.

  • Interactivity: Forest Construction VR Demo offers players excellent physical interactivity. Players will need to carry, transport, lift, and hold tools and construction materials, which have the necessary physical properties for realistic interaction.

  • Sandbox gameplay without survival: Forest Construction VR Demo does not limit you to survival, but invites you to immerse yourself in the creative process of construction and experimentation without unnecessary restrictions.

These key mechanics will help you create unique structures, enjoy the building process, and immerse yourself in the cozy atmosphere of the forest world of the game. Use these opportunities to have a great time.

movies.name: Forest Construction VR Demo Gameplay Trailer

name: Forest Construction VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest PC, HTC Vive, Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest PC, HTC Vive, Valve Index

short_description: Forest Construction VR Demo is your chance to experience the possibilities of freeform building in an engaging sandbox with realistic physics before the full game is released.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
